GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for the given article_id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects for the given article_id

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts a comment object to post to an article based on article_id, and serves the posted object

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts and object to increase number of votes of an article based on given article_id, serves updated article

article.title: Sony Vaio; or, The Laptop
article.body: I am the body of this article
article.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: accepts and object to increase number of votes of a comment based on given comment_id, serves updated comment

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
